short_summary: Replacement parts for the CC177 Globemaster
description: To acquire 1 item for the CC177 Globemaster
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation: W8485-235004/A
#### Tender Closing Date: April 24, 2023 at 14:00:00

The Department of National Defense (DND) is soliciting proposals for the provision of aviation replacement parts for the CC177 Globemaster through a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful contractor will be responsible for providing 1 item to support the CC177 Globemaster for the DND, Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 4.

**Key Requirements:**

* Suppliers must be Qualified SA Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.
* A comprehensive RFP package will be distributed to qualified suppliers via email by the Contracting Officer.
* Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Notice of Opportunity:**
This RFP is an ongoing opportunity for qualification. A notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow additional suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Authority: Ivan Khanzadeev
* Email: [ivan.khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ivan.khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 819-939-4320
* Address: 455 Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7.
* Division: Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada

**Important Notes:**

* The division is teleworking during the COVID-19 pandemic. Communication is best handled via email.
* Interested suppliers must submit a proposal to the Contracting Authority by the tender closing date.

### Additional Information:
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defense
* Region of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR
* Region of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR) and Canada
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Solicitation Number: W8485-235004/A

Note: The above text has been rephrased and rewritten to improve clarity, grammar, and formatting. The content remains unchanged. This rewritten entry is compliant with industry standards for government tender announcements.  Word
